products.name: Toyota Corolla
products.description: The Toyota Corolla offers a reliable manual driving experience with efficient fuel usage at 8 L/100km. It's equipped with all-season tires, making it a versatile choice for daily use.

products.name: Ferrari
products.description: Experience luxury with the Ferrari's automatic transmission. Despite its performance, it maintains fuel efficiency at 7.5 L/100km, paired with all-season tires for a smooth ride.

products.name: Fiat
products.description: The Fiat combines a manual transmission with performance tires for a sporty feel. It has a higher fuel usage at 12 L/100km, ideal for those who enjoy a spirited drive.

products.name: Chevrolet Tahoe
products.description: The Chevrolet Tahoe is designed for rugged terrains with its all-terrain tires and manual transmission. It consumes 14 L/100km, perfect for off-road adventures.

products.name: Volkswagen Golf
products.description: The Volkswagen Golf is an efficient choice with its automatic transmission and low fuel usage of 6.5 L/100km. Its all-season tires ensure comfort and stability throughout the year.

products.name: BMW 3 Series
products.description: The BMW 3 Series offers a thrilling drive with its manual transmission and performance tires. It has a moderate fuel consumption of 9 L/100km, combining style with efficiency.

products.name: Mercedes-Benz C-Class
products.description: The Mercedes-Benz C-Class delivers luxury and performance with a manual transmission and performance tires. It has a fuel usage of 9.5 L/100km, ideal for those who appreciate refined driving.

products.name: Hyundai Elantra
products.description: The Hyundai Elantra is an affordable and efficient option with automatic transmission and a fuel usage of 7 L/100km. Its all-season tires provide a reliable and smooth driving experience.

products.name: Tesla Model 3
products.description: The Tesla Model 3 offers a cutting-edge electric driving experience with a manual transmission. It comes with all-season tires, providing a futuristic and eco-friendly ride.

products.name: Nissan Altima
products.description: The Nissan Altima is a balanced choice with its manual transmission and efficient fuel usage of 8 L/100km. Its all-season tires make it versatile for various driving conditions.
